discourse_list.title: Can Decentralized Stablecoins Scale with Kurt Barry on Drinks with MakerDAO Delegates

content.content: The TRFM and the Decentralized Stablecoin Collateral Problem In this episode we talk with @Kurt_Barry of PECU about his personal opinion on why Decentralized Stablecoins will have a difficult time scaling and gaining World adoption. We also dig deep into the community’s discussion this week about turning back-on the DAI Savings Rate (DSR), as well as the brilliant invention of the TRFM (Target Rate Feedback Mechanism) by the late MakerDAO Co-Founder, Nikolai Mushegian. @ultraschuppi  and I were grateful to have spoken to Kurt, as we gained additional knowledge about the TRFM, the DeFi Collateral Problem, and so much more from the mind of one of Maker’s most brilliant developers.  Not Financial Advice This Content is for entertainment and informational purposes only, you should not construe any such information or other material as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice. Nothing contained on the FlipFlopFlap YouTube Channel constitutes a solicitation, recommendation, endorsement, or offer by @Kurt_Barry  a.k.a Kurt Barry @ultraschuppi a.k.a, Tim Schuppner @ElProgreso a.k.a, Frank Cruz @rspa a.k.a, Raphael Spannocchi, Flip Flop Flap Delegate LLC, Flipside Crypto, or any third party service provider to buy or sell any cryptocurrencies, securities, or other financial instruments. Nothing in this YouTube Video constitutes professional and/or financial advice.  The Tastings Kurt: Kimera Koffee Amber Toast    4.2 Stars      El Pro: 2019 Pinot Noir by Bogel Vineyards  : California   3.5 Stars     Schuppi: Weingut Bruno Leiner Traubensaft Weiss,    Germany  5 Stars
